title: ATOLL (Xbox) Giveaway
description: Get ATOLL for free on the Microsoft Store and play on Xbox One or Xbox Series X|S. ATOLL is a 3d first person underwater simulator featuring a vast ocean to explore. Check it out!
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download directly via Microsoft Store before the offer expires.
3. That´s it! Enjoy your new Xbox game!

title: DungeonLoot: Open Beta Has Arrived!
description: The GamerPower team is on a quest to bring more loot to gamers, so we created DungeonLoot. The idea is something like Amazon Prime Gaming, but completely free. No subscriptions or costs, just a place where you can claim gaming loot anytime. Our goal? To make DungeonLoot the ultimate place for gaming giveaways.
instructions: 1. Click the button to visit DungeonLoot. 2. Simply create an account. 3. Select your favorite giveaway and grab the loot. It's that easy!
platforms: PC, Steam, Epic Games Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Experience Scroll Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free The Elder Scrolls Online: Experience Scroll Key and unlock a (3x) Grand Gold coast Experience Scroll. This scroll will give you 150% Experience Point bonus from all sources for 1 hour.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
platforms: PC, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One

title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Pyromancer's Quandary Emote Key Giveaway
description: Are you playing The Elder Scrolls Online? Claim your free gift Key, unlock the Pyromancer's Quandary Emote and ignite the world!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
3. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
platforms: PC, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One

title: Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code
description:
Claim your Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code for free! Find the code below and follow the instructions to redeem your Emblem code.

CODE: ML3-FD4-ND9
instructions:
1. Navigate to the Destiny 2 code redemption page (click on the "Get Loot" button).
2. Choose your platform, sign in to your platform account, then just add your code and redeem it.
platforms: PC, Steam, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One
